title: AI Could Kill Around 3 Million Jobs In The Next 10 Years, Check Out The List Of High Risk Ones
description: Artificial Intelligence is increasingly influencing professional life, with a report from the National Foundation for Educational Research predicting the extinction of up to 3 million low-skilled jobs by 2035 due to AI and automation. , Technology & Science, Times Now
content: Artificial Intelligence, or AI is slowly and steadily becoming a major part of our life - especially on a professional level. And the maxed out use of the same has already impacted a lot of jobs. Now, a new report by the National Foundation for Educa... [1932 chars]

title: AI Profitability: The Key to Market Stability?
description: Investors are keenly observing artificial intelligence companies for signals of profitability amid the volatile U.S. equity market. Market dynamics are influenced by AI developments and expectations of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve. Meanwhile, economic releases are poised to reveal insights into the broader economy.
content: Investors will closely monitor artificial intelligence companies in the coming week, seeking signals of profitability crucial for stabilizing the U.S. equity market. The recent market rebound, following its largest pullback since April, was buoyed by... [836 chars]

title: How Emerging AI Use Cases Are Addressing the $8.5 Trillion US Skills Gap
description: The United States is in the midst of a skills gap that’s already proving to be costly in terms of lost growth, but emerging technologies like artificial intelligence promise to address these shortcomings without having to rely on replacing workers.
content:
McKinsey data estimates that the US gross domestic product could have been between 0.5% and 1.5% higher across the economy if employers were able to fill their excess job vacancies.
To make matters worse, PwC insights show that the skills gap in the ... [4724 chars]

title: Two Gen Zers turned down millions from Elon Musk to build an AI based on the human brain-and it's outperformed models from OpenAI and Anthropic
description: William Chen and Guan Wang believe they will be the first ones to build artificial general intelligence.

title: How Major Retailers Are Using AI to Change the Shopping Experience
description: Walmart, Target, and Home Depot are using artificial intelligence to offer shoppers personalized assistants and faster checkout experiences.
content:
Walmart introduced the world to its AI shopping assistant, Sparky, in June. Shoppers can use the chatbot in the Walmart app to find products, read reviews, and receive personalized purchase recommendations.

title: Finland strengthens digital defences with AI and media literacy from young, says education minister
description: Already the most media-literate nation in Europe, Finland is doubling down on efforts in schools to combat misinformation in the artificial intelligence era.
